thread.title: Three in critical condition after five-vehicle crash
thread.title_full: Three in critical condition after five-vehicle crash | Meridian - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Three in critical condition after five-vehicle crash
text:
Three people have been left fighting for their lives following a five-vehicle motorway pile-up in Kent.
Two men and a woman are in a critical condition after the crash on the M20 between junctions 8 and 9.
Two other victims, both men, suffered serious injuries in the collision involving an Audi TT, two lorries, a Vauxhall Vivaro and a Fiat Ducato.
It was the second serious crash on the same stretch of road within 24 hours.
Last updated Fri 16 Oct 2015 Travel
